biotools.summary:
Cellenics® is an open source, cloud-based analytics tool for single cell RNA sequencing data. It allows you to explore and analyze single cell datasets without the need to develop bioinformatics skills. Cellenics® has a user-friendly interface with a clear workflow. Offers a variety of pre-loaded publication-ready plots.

Cellenics® software was developed by © 2020-2022 President and Fellows of Harvard College.
Biomage is an open source software company that provided services to Harvard Medical School for the design and development of Cellenics®.
